string-array.name: def_array
string-array.item: use to connect the client(AVD) with the server and viceversa.
controls aspects and characteristics of the emulator.
Use to list android AVDs and manage updates for the SDK.
Take a screenshot of the screen in the emulator.
use to manage packages inside the AVD.
creates a check performance of the project in a html file.
Project is a set of folder and files which containt all the information about your application and functionality as well.
Panels are different sections in android studio where each section has a different fucntionality for your app.
is a section where are many functionalities of android studio, they are kind of considered as shorcuts.
Is where you can see the preview layour on how your layout will look on your app.
Is where you can can see many of the different views.
Is where you see your projects and its folders and files.
Stores metadata and is a gradle that helps communicate with the OS, other platforms and libraries.
Provides elements and attributtes,and default values for layouts.
A project is composed by modules that define it and brings these modules together and tied them into a greater whole.
Allows you to preview the user interface from your application without running it on the emulator.
commit is used to record all the changes you made to your files.
push is to update files from your repositories after making a commit.
Add is for adding any changed files for the next commit.
Pull is for fetching changes from the specified branch and merge into to the current one.
Branch is used for managing branches (create, list, delete).
Clone copies a repository from one directory to another directory.
